#summary This is a help file for the Salt Water element

= Salt Water =

Salt water can produced in one of two ways. First you can draw it on the screen just like regular water. Secondly, you can mix the [Salt] element with the [Water] element. Salt water floats on [Oil] and sinks in [Water]. When it comes into contact with [Fire] or [Magma], it will evaporate and create [Steam]. Salt water will also melt [Ice] and kill [Plant].
